definition: quilt/by/(indicates passive-voice clauses)/(literary) to cover/to meet with/(coll.) (since c. 2009) used before a verb that does not accurately represent what actually happened, to describe with black humor how sb or sth was dealt with by the authorities (as in 被自殺|被自杀[bei4 zi4 sha1])
to control/to accuse/to charge/to sue/to invert a container to empty it/(suffix) (slang) buff/enthusiast/devotee/-phile or -philia

sentences.english: McCoy is charged with unlawfully taking the car, and is now awaiting trial.
sentences.chinese: 麥考伊被控以非法取走車輛的罪名，目前正等候審判。

sentences.english: He was charged with murder but found innocent later.
sentences.chinese: 他被控殺人，但後來發現他是無罪的。

sentences.english: Many women accused of practicing witchcraft were tortured or even burned to death.
sentences.chinese: 許多女人被控行巫術，遭受拷打後被施以火刑。

sentences.english: Lester is accused of fatally shooting 36-year-old Ronald E.
sentences.chinese: 萊斯特被控射殺36歲的羅納德東施拉特。

sentences.english: Mr. Zhu was charged with first-degree murder and was being held at the Montgomery County Jail.
sentences.chinese: 朱海洋被控一級謀殺目前被押於蒙哥馬利郡監獄。

sentences.english: Marman also was booked for resisting arrest after a fracas with an arresting officer.
sentences.chinese: 馬曼也因與逮捕他的警官吵鬧而被控以拒捕罪。

sentences.english: Most of the charges carry a maximum sentence of life in prison.
sentences.chinese: 其中大多數被控罪行最高可判終身監禁。

sentences.english: Mychal Bell faces aggravated battery charges in the beating of a white classmate.
sentences.chinese: 貝爾因毆打一名白人同學被控嚴重二級毆打罪。

sentences.english: He is also accused of siphoning off funds for his own enrichment.
sentences.chinese: 他還被控轉移資金自肥。

sentences.english: The system-allocated virtual memory that has been charged to a process and that can be paged.
sentences.chinese: 該系統分配的虛擬內存，已被控一個過程，可以分頁。

sentences.english: Nine of them are also charged with money laundering.
sentences.chinese: 其中九人還被控洗錢罪。

sentences.english: Conrad Murray, Michael Jackson's doctor, was found guilty of involuntary manslaughter.
sentences.chinese: 米高積遜的醫生默裏被控非自願性誤殺罪名成立。

sentences.english: He has been accused of spying.
sentences.chinese: 他被控犯有從事間諜罪。

sentences.english: The fetus survived, but she was charged with criminal solicitation to commit murder.
sentences.chinese: 胎兒還是保住了，但是她被控教唆他人實施謀殺。

sentences.english: Last year, Dostum was accused of a drunken attack on a rival.
sentences.chinese: 去年，杜斯塔姆被控酒後攻擊一名競爭對手。

sentences.english: He wanted to be accused of larceny, because he felt comfortable in prison .
sentences.chinese: 他想被控爲盜竊犯，因爲他覺得監獄裏很舒服。

definition: on trial (for a crime)/to stand trial
to imprison/to jail/to take into custody
